 Okay - as I said the message was originally in French. Immediately after it was delivered, it was translated into various languages and printed in the papers, the English version appearing in L'Osservatore Romano, the official English newspaper of the Vatican. The rush to print caused a hurried translation in which words rather than ideas were translated. Thus, the first English version had the Pope saying that there is more than one hypothesis in evolution. The next day L'Osservatore Romano printed a corrected version in which the Pope said that evolution was more than an hypothesis.
 
 Well, in spite of the fact that the second version is the "official" version from the Vatican, American fundamentalists cling to the first.
